Posts.Content: CCBoise wrote: April/28/08 I had a total R hip replacement.  Now with IFLC Breast Cancer dx and Mast/lymphectomy 11/25/08. Onco recommends TX/Cy regime, followed with Tamox-5 yrs.  I am worried about chemo damage to my prostethic hip. Any experiances? Encouragements? Dx 10/30/2008, ILC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 1/23 nodes, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Chemo and joint replacements CCBoise hbernier
